name: European and Regional Affairs Consultants B.V.
goal:
Vertalen van Europees beleid naar Nederlandse (grens-) regio's.
Benutten van Europese programma's en instrumenten voor (met name) Nederlandse opdrachtgevers.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Cohesiebeleid, Innovatiebeleid, Energiebeleid en energietransitie, Milieubeleid, Connecting Europe Facility, Begroting, Meerjarig financieel kader, Arbeidsmarktbeleid,
Grensoverschrijdende samenwerking, Groei- en Stabiliteitspact, Digitale agenda, Urban Agenda, Urban innovative actions
